name: Tavtekka 2024
description:
The time is January 2023.

You have been assigned to team up with Pelo Dominganules. Your name is Pelo's Student. Your mission is to become a Tekk Froth Vice Duke. However, don't forget about Crone 7200. Our enemy is not keen on you trying to have your way.  Created by Sa Larry Tavtekka.

Movement = arrow keys

Jump = Up arrow
